mapper.sql: IN_ID inId, STAGE_ID stageId, IS_OWNER isOwner, IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, FILE_TYPE fileType, MAT_ID matId, CERT_ID certId, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, IS_DELETED isDeleted, SORT_NO sortNo, IS_COMMON isCommon, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId

${alias}.IN_ID inId, ${alias}.STAGE_ID stageId, ${alias}.IS_OWNER isOwner, ${alias}.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, ${alias}.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, ${alias}.FILE_TYPE fileType, ${alias}.MAT_ID matId, ${alias}.CERT_ID certId, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ${alias}.SORT_NO sortNo, ${alias}.IS_COMMON isCommon, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_PAR_IN where IN_ID = #{id} AND IS_DELETED = '0'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aea_par_stage_item_in apsii, aea_par_stage_item apsi WHERE apsi.STAGE_ITEM_ID = apsii.STAGE_ITEM_ID AND apsi.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} AND apsi.ITEM_VER_ID = #{itemVerId} AND apsii.IN_ID = #{inId} GROUP BY apsii.IN_ID
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_PAR_IN ( IN_ID, STAGE_ID, IS_OWNER, IS_STATE_IN, PAR_STATE_ID, FILE_TYPE, MAT_ID, CERT_ID, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, IS_DELETED, SORT_NO, IS_COMMON, ROOT_ORG_ID ) values ( #{inId}, #{stageId}, #{isOwner}, #{isStateIn}, #{parStateId}, #{fileType}, #{matId}, #{certId}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{sortNo}, #{isCommon}, #{rootOrgId} )
mapper.update:
update AEA_PAR_IN
IN_ID = #{inId},
STAGE_ID = #{stageId},
IS_OWNER = #{isOwner},
IS_STATE_IN = #{isStateIn},
PAR_STATE_ID = #{parStateId},
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType},
MAT_ID = #{matId},
CERT_ID = #{certId},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo},
IS_COMMON = #{isCommon},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where IN_ID = #{inId}
mapper.select:
select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, mat.MAT_NAME aeaMatCertName, mat.MAT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, mat.MAT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo, mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE isGlobalShare, mat.IS_COMMON isCommon from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_ITEM_MAT mat
and parIn.MAT_ID = mat.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE = '1' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' and mat.IS_DELETED = '0' and ( parIn.PAR_STATE_ID = #{parStateId} or parIn.PAR_STATE_ID is null ) and mat.IS_COMMON = #{isCommon} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '1'
and ( mat.MAT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or mat.MAT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select distinct parIn.MAT_ID matId from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_ITEM_MAT mat
and parIn.MAT_ID = mat.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.IS_OWNER = '1' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '1' and parIn.PAR_STATE_ID = #{parStateId} and parIn.IS_DELETED='0' and mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE = '1' and mat.IS_ACTIVE = '1' and mat.IS_DELETED = '0'

select distinct parIn.CERT_ID certId from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_CERT cert
and cert.CERT_ID = parIn.CERT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = cert.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'cert' and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and cert.IS_DELETED = '0'

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.IS_COMMON else '0' end) isCommon, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.MAT_NAME else cert.CERT_NAME end) aeaMatCertName, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.MAT_MEMO else cert.CERT_MEMO end) aeaMatCertMemo, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.MAT_CODE else cert.CERT_CODE end) aeaMatCertCode, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE else '0' end) isGlobalShare from AEA_PAR_IN parIn left join AEA_ITEM_MAT mat on ( mat.MAT_ID = parIn.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID ) left join AEA_CERT cert on ( cert.CERT_ID = parIn.CERT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = cert.ROOT_ORG_ID )
and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and (parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' or parIn.FILE_TYPE= 'cert' ) and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and (mat.IS_DELETED = '0' or cert.IS_DELETED = '0')
and ( mat.MAT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or mat.MAT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or cert.CERT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or cert.CERT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.IS_COMMON else '0' end) isCommon, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.MAT_NAME else cert.CERT_NAME end) aeaMatCertName, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.MAT_MEMO else cert.CERT_MEMO end) aeaMatCertMemo, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.MAT_CODE else cert.CERT_CODE end) aeaMatCertCode, (case when parIn.FILE_TYPE='mat' then mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE else '0' end) isGlobalShare from AEA_PAR_IN parIn left join AEA_ITEM_MAT mat on ( mat.MAT_ID = parIn.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID ) left join AEA_CERT cert on ( cert.CERT_ID = parIn.CERT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = cert.ROOT_ORG_ID )
and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '0' and (parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' or parIn.FILE_TYPE= 'cert' ) and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and (mat.IS_DELETED = '0' or cert.IS_DELETED = '0')
and ( mat.MAT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or mat.MAT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or cert.CERT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or cert.CERT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, mat.MAT_NAME aeaMatCertName, mat.MAT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, mat.MAT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo, mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE isGlobalShare, mat.IS_COMMON isCommon from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_ITEM_MAT mat
and parIn.MAT_ID = mat.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '0' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and mat.IS_DELETED = '0'
and ( mat.MAT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or mat.MAT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, mat.MAT_NAME aeaMatCertName, mat.MAT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, mat.MAT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo, mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE isGlobalShare from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_ITEM_MAT mat
and parIn.MAT_ID = mat.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '1' and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' and mat.IS_DELETED = '0'
and ( mat.MAT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or mat.MAT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, cert.CERT_NAME aeaMatCertName, cert.CERT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, cert.CERT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_CERT cert
and cert.CERT_ID = parIn.CERT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = cert.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '1' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'cert' and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and cert.IS_DELETED = '0'
and ( cert.CERT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or cert.CERT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, mat.MAT_NAME aeaMatCertName, mat.MAT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, mat.MAT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo, mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE isGlobalShare, mat.IS_COMMON isCommon from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_ITEM_MAT mat
and parIn.MAT_ID = mat.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE = '1' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' and mat.IS_DELETED = '0' and mat.IS_COMMON = #{isCommon} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = #{isStateIn}
and ( parIn.PAR_STATE_ID = #{parStateId} or parIn.PAR_STATE_ID is null )
and ( mat.MAT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or mat.MAT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, cert.CERT_NAME aeaMatCertName, cert.CERT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, cert.CERT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_CERT cert
and cert.CERT_ID = parIn.CERT_ID and cert.ROOT_ORG_ID = parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '0' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'cert' and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and cert.IS_DELETED = '0'
and ( cert.CERT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or cert.CERT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, mat.MAT_NAME aeaMatCertName, mat.MAT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, mat.MAT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo, mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE isGlobalShare from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_ITEM_MAT mat
and parIn.MAT_ID = mat.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.PAR_STATE_ID = #{stateId} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '1' and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' and mat.IS_DELETED = '0'
and ( mat.MAT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or mat.MAT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.IN_ID inId, parIn.STAGE_ID stageId, parIn.IS_OWNER isOwner, parIn.IS_STATE_IN isStateIn, parIn.PAR_STATE_ID parStateId, parIn.FILE_TYPE fileType, parIn.MAT_ID matId, parIn.CERT_ID certId, parIn.CREATER creater, parIn.CREATE_TIME createTime, parIn.MODIFIER modifier, parIn.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, parIn.IS_DELETED isDeleted, cert.CERT_NAME aeaMatCertName, cert.CERT_CODE aeaMatCertCode, cert.CERT_MEMO aeaMatCertMemo from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_CERT cert
and cert.CERT_ID = parIn.CERT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = cert.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and parIn.PAR_STATE_ID = #{stateId} and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '1' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'cert' and parIn.IS_DELETED = '0' and cert.IS_DELETED = '0'
and ( cert.CERT_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or cert.CERT_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by parIn.CREATE_TIME desc

select parIn.MAT_ID matId from AEA_PAR_IN parIn, AEA_ITEM_MAT mat
and parIn.MAT_ID = mat.MAT_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = mat.ROOT_ORG_ID and parIn.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and parIn.IS_OWNER = '1' and parIn.FILE_TYPE = 'mat' and parIn.IS_STATE_IN = '1' and parIn.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and ( parIn.PAR_STATE_ID is null or parIn.PAR_STATE_ID = #{parStateId} ) and parIn.IS_DELETED='0' and mat.IS_GLOBAL_SHARE = '1' and mat.IS_ACTIVE = '1' and mat.IS_DELETED = '0'
